author: Gilad Barkai
comment: 1. Scrolling the remote on the watch it very poor. 2. Being a round watch, the top left button, power, is barely viewable and barely clickable.  3. It's very disappointing to see there's no navigation (Arrows + Select) on the remote. Smart TVs rely on these heavily.
title: Not really functional on the Moto 360
